name: 2nd World Conference on Management, Business, and Finance
content: The 2nd World Conference on Management, Business, and Finance (WORLDMBF) is a premier management conference that brings together scholars, researchers, and professionals from around the world to discuss the latest trends, innovations, and challenges in the fields of management, business, and finance. At WORLDMBF, attendees have the opportunity to share their research, insights, and experiences with others in their field, while also learning from experts and exploring new ideas. The business and management landscape is constantly evolving, and management conferences 2024 can help stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in the field. WORLDMBF 2024 will be held on 05 – 07 July in Istanbul, Turkey, a city that is known for its vibrant business and finance hub, diverse culture, and modern amenities. Attendees can look forward to two days of engaging discussions, networking, and learning in a dynamic and international setting. The conference program will feature keynote speeches, panel discussions, paper presentations, and poster sessions, covering a wide range of topics in the fields of management, business, and finance.
